mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEmTran Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ TRAN_PR , TRAN_REFKEY , TRAN_ID , TRAN_PHONE , TRAN_CALLBACK , TRAN_STATUS , TRAN_DATE , TRAN_RSLTDATE , TRAN_REPORTDATE , TRAN_RSLT , TRAN_NET , TRAN_MSG , TRAN_ETC1 , TRAN_ETC2 , TRAN_ETC3 , TRAN_ETC4 , TRAN_TYPE FROM EM_TRAN WHERE 1 = 1 AND TRAN_PR = #{tranPr,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteEmTran Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM EM_TRAN WHERE 1 = 1 AND TRAN_PR = #{tranPr,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
